objects.text:
✓ Quilted Design
✓ Windproof Material
✓ Casual Style
✓ Warm Padding

product_details.name: MAGCOMSEN Bomber Jackets for Men Winter Casual Quilted Jacket Warm Windproof Padded Jackets Zip Up Coats
product_details.description: Package Dimensions: 14.65 x 11.57 x 4.17 inches; 10.58 ounces. Department: Men. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 50 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sleek promotional design for a winter bomber jacket. It features a left-aligned text layout with bold title text elements (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) in large uppercase white font for emphasis. A supporting tagline (`tagline`) in a fresh light green adds a modern touch and highlights seasonal relevance. Below, a list of jacket features (`description`) appears in a clean, readable font. The main pricing (`price`) is prominently displayed in bold white for visibility. A strong call-to-action button (`cta`) in green over a matching rectangular background (`cta_background`) appears beneath. The right side features a sharply detailed product image (`product_image`) overlapping a diagonal dual-tone background (`background`) with dark navy and light grey gradients. Decorative elements (`decorative`) add structure to the text section.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Navy: #1a2a3a
- Light Grey: #e8e9ea
- White: #ffffff
- Mint Green: #90EE90
- Deep Teal: #2d3a4a
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern bomber jacket that primarily utilizes a minimalist black-and-white color palette. The dominant color is crisp white (#F2F2F2), creating a clean and contemporary appearance. The accents on the collar, cuffs, zipper lining, and hem are in solid black (#1A1A1A), providing a bold contrast that enhances the jacket’s structured design. The inner quilted lining is a soft grayish-white (#E6E6E6), subtly breaking the monotony while maintaining elegance. The interplay of light and shadow on the fabric highlights the jacket’s texture. For an ad banner, a palette of white, black, silver gray (#CCCCCC), and charcoal (#333333) would be ideal.
